doc:
Kelly Rutherford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kelly_Rutherford 0 Kelly Rutherford (born Kelly Rutherford Deane; November 6, 1968) is an American actress. She is known for her television roles as Stephanie "Sam" Whitmore on the NBC daytime soap opera Generations (1989–1991), as Megan Lewis on the Fox primetime soap opera Melrose Place (1996–1999), and as Lily van der Woodsen on The CW series Gossip Girl (2007–2012). Kelly_Rutherford ( born Kelly_Rutherford_Deane ; November_6_,_1968 ) is an_American_actress . She is_known for her_television_roles as Stephanie_"_Sam_"_Whitmore on the_NBC_daytime_soap_opera_Generations ( 1989 – 1991_) , as Megan_Lewis on the_Fox_primetime_soap_opera_Melrose_Place_(_1996 – 1999_) , and as Lily_van_der_Woodsen on The_CW_series_Gossip_Girl_(_2007 – 2012_) .
